messages.subject: More of the same awful stuff
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/3/03 7:40:45 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/3/03 7:40:45 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< One can't help but wonder how this guy teaches his own children these
"important lessons", makes them stand in a circle while he throws balls
at them hard?
>>

That was really, really yucky.
I just don't understand how people come to the conclusion that kids will deal
with lifes difficulties better by being bullied and put down. Yuck.
Dodge ball in school was a nightmare. How well I remember being chosen last,
probably the biggest scar to my self esteem. And then the bigger, stronger
kids deciding to take out their awful life frustration on YOU and peg you so
hard with the ball that you felt like crying. But heaven forbid you should
show any weakness and fuel the fire.
Oh yuck, yuck, yuck.....this guy really pissed me off.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
